home.description: It's not a secret, that more than 95% of users leave sites, don't giving any information about themselves.

features.title: Features
features.description: Fill your target audience base using visitors contacts.

pricing.title: Pricing

business.title: Start 7 days trial

features.title: Tools that work
features.description: Exactly in this way subscribe popups work. Irritating, unpleasant windows, only you wanna do is CLOSE them. Be careful.

answers.title: Information and contacts
answers.description: You can collect not only contacts, but also any other information like car model, wife's name and phone.

statistic.title: Responses funnel
statistic.description: Using responses funnel you can recognize questions which don't convert users to next questions (bad questions), and then write better ones instead of them.

constructor.title: Page constructor
constructor.description: Create questions and start collecting contacts - easy. Don't leave clients, which didn't take your offer, just propose them unique offer, but a little bit later.
